attributes.action: Improve school lunch standards to ensure all children eat lunch
attributes.additional_details: Not only do children find the food disgusting and extremely unapetsing, both teachers and parents have also commented on the situation and are worried for the health of students for skipping out such vital nutrients. In addition, without a sustainable amount of energy, children will be in able to concentrate in lessons which can affect their education.
attributes.background: For the past five years, I have been in secondary school and I am currently undergoing my GCSE’s. I have raised concern over the school food standards as many children are missing out lunch which is vital to growth. This is due to bad hygiene and poor food which puts of children from their food.
